summary: A small collection of three Racemenu presets: an Imperial, A Dunmer and a Bosmer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial][size=3][b][u]

DISCLAIMER:[/u] [/b] My presets generally feature very humanoid-looking Mer, as I generally headcanon that my PCs are of mixed heritage. If that isn't your bag - don't download :)

[/size][/font][color=#f4f4f4]****[/color]
[/center][center]
Continuing on from my last two presets/followers [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80085/?]Ambre Greenham[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79858/?]Rosentia Mateus[/url], here are another three presets and sculpt files designed to be compatible with Racemenu: Elise, Alyssa and Bethelyn.[/center]

[u]
[/u][center][/center][u] Mods Required: 

[/u][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] by Expired6978

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]'DIMONIZED UNP female body'[/url] by dimon99 

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints[/url] by Veeblix

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]'Brows'[/url] by Hvergelmir

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normalmap Fix[/url] by MrDave

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by Diethardt

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20483/?]Women of Skyrim Normalmaps[/url] by Zzjay

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]'KS Hairdos - Renewal'[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71054/?]'Bijin NPCs'[/url] by rxkx22 (Seriously, GET THEM) for her stunning UNP custom skin texture mashup, the full credits of which being as follows:
[/list] [size=2] 'SG Female Textures and More' by HelloSanta [/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?] 'SG Female Textures Renewal'[/url] by Hello Santa 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?] 'Mature skin texture and body for UNP(B) 7BASE CBBE Vanilla'[/url] by Maevan2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761/?] 'Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase'[/url] by Zonzai and Seren4XX
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?] 'Seductive Lips HD'[/url] by EcthelionOtW
'High Poly Hands and Feet for UNP bodies' by Halofarm v1.0


[center]
****

[u][b]Elise (Imperial)[/b]
[/u][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam[/center]
[center][b]
****
[/b][/center][u][center][b]Bethelyn Lichenmire (Bosmer)[/b][/center][/u]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]'Freckle Mania'[/url] by Tetrodoxin
'Improved Eyes Skyrim' by Jen (Not on the Nexus)

****

[u][b]Alyssa Terai (Dunmer)[/b][/u][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60954/?]LiEyes[/url] by LithiumFlower

****[/center]


[u] To install:[/u]

1)  Put the jslot file of your desired preset into Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Chargen/Presets
2) Put the .nif and .dds files into Skyrim/Data/SKSA/Chargen


Then, in the character creator:

1) Select the 'Presets' tab
2) Press F9 to load a preset
3) Choose your preset
4) If for any reason the face looks wrong, go to the 'Sculpt Tab'. Select F9 to load a preset and choose the name of your chosen preset. That should fix all issues :)



[center][color=#6fa8dc][size=3][b]**~  Enjoy folks!  ~**[/b][/size][/color][/center]


[u][b] Permissions:[/b][/u]

You may not create a follower of these presets without my permission. Not to be uploaded to any paid mod sites.
author: Drift Avalii
